forecast.name: Today
forecast.shortForecast: Partly Sunny then Slight Chance Rain Showers
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers after 1pm. Partly sunny, with a high near 66. West southwest wind 3 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers. Partly cloudy. Low around 46, with temperatures rising to around 48 overnight. West wind 3 to 8 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
